messages.subject: pokemon diamond and vocabulary
messages.msgSnippet: My 11 yr old son just came to me with a list of words to look up. I asked him where they came from and he said pokemon diamond! Apparently I looked confused,
messages.messageBody:
My 11 yr old son just came to me with a list of words to look up. I
asked him where they came from and he said pokemon diamond! Apparently
I looked confused, because he continued to inform me that you visit
this old guy in a house and he asks you if you "want to learn a trendy
new saying?" You say yes or no, and if you say yes he gives you a new
word!
Here are the words he gave me:bone
density,flambe,neutrino,cubism,GMT,polyphenol and starboard.

Just something I can keep in mind when I start getting worried that
video games are not time well spent!
-Kelly
